content.detailedDescription: My husband & i left a restaurant near scranton pa, on the way home from upstate ny, & noticed a very very very bright star.  it seemed to have moved around in the same area for about 5 minutes or so.  it did not appear to be an airplane or a helicopter...It was way too high up.  i was intrigued enough to take some photos of it, which i have enclosed.
content.summary: Looked like a very bright star, but moved around in small area for about 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out my 3rd story window and saw a commercial airline on its usual path,when i noticed a star-like object tailing it not far behind the airliner.It swayed from side to side,then went under the airliner,and then back behind it again,untill they were both out of my sight.The amount of time i watched was under 5 minutes aprox.I did not know what it was or could have been,thus why i'm reporting it.I will say that these unusual lights or whatever they are,are often in the skies above.I think most people don't look up at the sky,along with our eyes/senses are not as strong as maybe they once were.It amazes me how oblivious people can be.This is my second time reporting a ufo,although i have neglected to report any others.I recently found out about this site,and i will encourage others who have seen ufos to report.
content.summary: Witnessed a ufo tailing a commercial airliner.It was star-like & very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Just after 1 am, after leaving work at the kendall wal-mart (store 1680), i sat on a bench outside the store to wait for my ride home.  the air was thick with smoke and the sky was in a complete haze.  later, i was told that this was the result of fires in broward county drifting southward.  so thick was the haze that stars were not visible it was reflecting the ambiant street lights.  at the time i was speaking with my wife over my cell phone and was staring out over the store's parking lot.  then, suddenly, through the trees, roughly south-south east of my position, i saw a solid orange dot appear and swing down a few feet in an arc like motion and disappeared as suddenly as it appeared.  except for the arcing motion, i'd almost guess it was a shooting star except that it was appeared in front of the haze in the sky, rather than through it.  also the shape of it was puzzling as well.  i've seen shooting stars before but...  this looked like a hard orange dot.  no lens flare, no shimmering, nothing of that sort.  it was just a hard orange dot.  not sure how else to describe it.  as if you used a hole punch on a piece of orange paper, i guess.  the sighting lasted only a second and the object never reappeared.  it could've been a shooting star but the peculiarness of it, i thought warranted reporting, if nothing else to see if anyone else saw it too.
content.summary: A questionable meteor.

content.detailedDescription: E5gh
content.summary: Sth.

content.detailedDescription: Flew from north to south. clicked off 3 photos b4 it disappeared.  i was watching sky in my moms backyard(which is where i've seen all the recent phenomona i photoed. i saw it streaking across eastern sky.  2 fast for a plane, probably  ufo.
content.summary: Eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription: Xgf
content.summary: Xftngx.

content.detailedDescription: On september 16 2008 my wife and i were headed to el paso from san antonio on i-10 west.At around 3:00 pm  just west of sierra blanca my wife noticed an object in the sky on her side. she said it appeared to be triangular in shape, rotating and going in and out of the cloud's as if following us.I stopped, got out and started  recording it.At first i saw what appeared to be a small white cloud but after zooming in and out a few times it did appear to be an object pyramid in shape and rotating. we continued to record for a while then left.The recording looks blurry when viewed on tv but it does appear to be a  pyramid shaped object that is rotating. during the entire recording the clouds are moving slowly from west to east and changing shape while the object stay's in the same place. a few weeks later we were watching your tv show, the episode were a farmer discovers a pyramid shape ufo on his field and as soon as he starts up his tractor the ufo pops up in the air, starts to rotate and hover around before shooting off into the sky. when my wife first saw it,she said it was very similar to what she had seen and added that the door on the side was the same, something she had not mentioned before.I then told her the thing was to far to tell if it had any doors on it. she then explained that yes it was very far when i started recording, but that at the beganing when i was driving, the object was following close enough that she could make out a door.
content.summary: Recorded pyramid shaped object. ufo  ?

content.detailedDescription: Ar
content.summary: Era.

content.detailedDescription:
Jan. 30, 2009, 7:20 p.M.: i was driving south on hwy 206.  i had just left cisco (about 4-5 miles south of), after having dinner with my husband at a local cafe.  to my left out the driver's side window, i noticed a red "flash".  i took my eyes briefly off the road and saw what appeared to be 3 or 4 red lights in a row.  these lights were larger than stars or planets but smaller than an aspirin.  they flashed (blinked) intermittently and independently.  at first i thought it was an airplane but i did not see a green nav light, however i did briefly see a small white light that flashed a couple of times, very quickly. i had to look back at the road, then as i turned my head left again to look, the lights disappeared.  they suddenly showed up further north, opposite the direction i was headed.  i could not pull over and stop, as there was a lot of traffic on the road tonight, the shoulder is very narrow and i had a vehicle riding my bumper.  by the time i got home, i was almost 10 miles further south and the lights were gone.
the lights were in a line (north to nouth), moving from the south to the north.  they appeared to be 30 degrees above the eastern horizon, possibly over dublin.  i estimate the elevation to have been between 2500 to 3500 ft.
i could not tell if the object(s) made noise and i'm sorry i could not take a photo, as my hands were busy with the steering wheel and i had to contend with a tailgater.
content.summary: I think i saw the same red lights that someone else near stephenville saw, at about the same time, in opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription:
A stephenville area resident was shown this evening on kwtx news 10 cbs waco, texas. here is that residents account that he gave to kwtx-tv as posted on the news 10 website:

(reported by matt collins)

at about 7:15pm this evening on the horizon in the north west, there they were 3 hovering bright red lights. 

nothing like i have ever seen. 

they would sporadically appear and disappear in different locations in the same part of the sky. 

i waited for about five minutes and finally another light, of the same brightness and intensity, appeared in the same location, only this time it was moving across the horizon. 

just like the other lights before it, this one disappeared the same way. 

me and my sister both witnessed the lights over stephenville. 

the reason i know these were not airplanes or jets is because just off to the north of the ufo's was the path that airliners and other jets arrive at dfw, so i had an almost side by side comparison of the two different crafts as a point of reference to make my judgment call.


the whole story can be viewed at:
http://www.Kwtx.Com/iwitness/headlines/38721747.Html
content.summary: Ufo reported by area resident on kwtx-tv news 10 waco, texas.

content.detailedDescription: My two daughters came in from the store and said dad come look at this it was 9:10.I saw two unidentified objects with multi colored lights flickering like the flame on a candle. the first was about three miles to the south of i30,the second was about six miles to the west.Both objects hovered for at least five min. the object to the south moved very slowly toward the interstate and started heading east for about three miles then turned north and shot straight up out of sight.The object to the west continued to hover and then vanished from eyesight.These objects had no sound what so ever and had every color of the rainbow flickering on them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two objects hovering multi colored flickering lights both had one bright light.

content.detailedDescription: Saw these tonight on a phoenix camelback webcam.Here is the link http://www.Phoenixvis.Net/came1/index.Html
content.summary: Phoenix lights again!

content.detailedDescription:
I had happen to just look out the window saw the moon and what i thought was a star below it.The object was in one postion for few minutes it was most likely moving slowly.I got binoculars out to look at it and saw a bright yeelow-orange light... it might have been around 5 little lights together, i also saw a red ball next to it that was dim.
my vison is a little bad so some things could have been decieving but i thought i saw it change from that ball to a circle with the yellow orange lights around it. when it got farther away like 5 minutes later i checked it out again with the binoculars and saw it change back and forth about every 10 seconds from the yellow-orange to a tealblue-aqua-greenish color
it was moving slow and and i started to loose it under a tree line the object was bright without using the binoculars but using them it wasn't
it was too small and or wouldn't show up on a camera
i have 2 others with me that saw it though one doesn't think it was one and the other did'nt know what it was. if it was an aircraft i am sorry but i've never seen one go so slow.
content.summary: Slow moving yellow orange object.

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us were returning home to new hope on i 95 on the evening of dec. 26, 2008 (i'm guessing it was around 7:00 pm) following a shopping trip at oxford valley mall, when suddenly i noticed a bright, perfectly round light in the sky through the upper left side of the windshield.  i thought, "what on earth is that?  it's too high up to be a ground-bound electric light and it's too bright to be an airplane." it made me think of a giant football field light only it was 'way up there in the sky.  to my astonishment, the orb then suddenly expanded and completely vanished without a trace.  i was dumbfounded--i didn't know if my mind was playing tricks on me or what.

but at exactly the same moment that i yelled out, the other 2 occupants of the car also started shouting, "what was that! did you see that???  did you just see a bright light explode and disappear????"  the other 2 in the described seeing exactly the same light that i saw.  i commented that i didn't think it could be an airplane exploding because i thought a plane would look like a 'gasoline explosion' with orange-burning parts falling away from it.  this was pure bright white light, and it was a perfect circle, even as it expanded and then disappeared.

we also noticed that the car ahead of us slowed to a dead stop midway on the exit ramp, as if its driver too had seen something that distracted him from driving.  i was tempted to jump out of the car and ask the driver if he had seen the same thing but i didn't.

remember that 'ufo' simply means "unidentified flying object," nothing more--the term 'ufo' in itself does not mean 'alien spacecraft.'  all 3 of us, including my husband who is a satellite engineer, believe that what we saw was a meteor.

as my husband explained, "they are called 'meteoroids' when they're in outer space; they are called 'meteors' when people can see them [because they have hit the earth's oxygen-filled atmosphere and burn brightly enough to see]; and they are called 'meteorites' when they hit the ground.

we believe that what we saw on dec. 26, 2008, in bucks county, was a meteor.
content.summary: On dec. 26, 3 of us in car saw bright orb in sky for about 15 secs, which then expanded, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out back looked up and saw 2 beautiful objects...Square shape. 5 lights...2red in front, 2green in back 1 bright,clear in mid-section but no body. i looked for a cabin cause i thought it was a plain. but no body to it. no sound whatsoever. they were flying dangerously close. not as high a plane would fly. coming right toward me. i listened but no sound. freaky but beautiful object. flew over my house slowly and then gone...



please have a mufon investigator contact me. thank you.
nancy
content.summary: Weeknight...7pm (aprox) dark out. 5 lights - 2 in front (red) 2 in back (green) 1 in center (clear). big square. 2 objects side by side dangerously close. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
we were just coming back into town on broadway, which at the time was overhung by elm trees on both sides.  a couple of blocks in, i saw this ten foot or so circle of blue light float over the opening in the trees, moving from ne to sw.  maybe going about twenty mph at a hundred feet or so.
  it was an overcast night, and the streetlights weren't all that bright on that street, so the motion of a different color light caught my eye.
  i didn't say anything at first, but the girl with me said, "did you see that?"  
  we never were able to guess what it was.  the most 'likely' that we could come up with was maybe some kind of airplane, but i don't think there are any blue lights on planes.
  like i said, all we saw was the thing float through the gap between the trees...
  neither of us were all that upset or scared, just wondered what the heck it could of been.
content.summary: Blue, darker in the center and with a lighter blue circumference.

content.detailedDescription: on 11-16-08 up until present day there has been multiple crafts in the sky every night.  they come out when it's dark and there out until sunrise.  the first night i saw the craft i was looking throught the garage door window when i saw what i thought was a plane with it's landing lights coming down.  there was blue and red flashing and i realized it wasn't a plane when it was staying in the same position for over ten minutes.  the one i just described is the lowest one there is and there are well over 20 crafts scattered all over the sky at a higher altitude that i can see with my binocualrs.  the crafts flash blue and red, green, amber, yellow, and the most beautiful color purple that i have ever seen.  it appears to move from town to town also.  around 6:00 i will look towards the town of folsom with the binoculars and i can see the craft and the colors on it.  then around seven i can see it above the near town of citrus heights and around 7:30 or 8pm it's in front of me in my town of antelope where it moves a little more but it stays with us for the remainder of the night.  also, the latter in the evening it get's the more they move around like if they were dancing up and down and side to side.  there's also one more craft that is different then the others because this one i thought was a planet until it starts to dance around like the others or dashes way out of view when a plane or helicopter comes towards it's direction.  this one move's more around when it first comes out unlike the other ones that dance around later in the evening.  there's a video clip of the last one that i described.  i don't know how to copy and paste but if you go to google and type in sacramento news 10 ufo you can see the news chopper and it's crew chasing the object.  the news station did a follow up to the story and it was explained away as a light sign being towed by plane which is an out right lie.  it hovers in the same spot for over an hour until it starts slowly moving toward the next towm.  ever since it's been said it was sign i havent' heard another about it.  it was all over the morning news radio and everyone was talking about it every where.  know, i haven't heard a word about it any where for since the news story.  i'm a little uncomfortable with all of this going on right above my house.  i also neve lose any sight of them unless i go to bed or it'd raining or cloudy.  even when there's rain or clouds there always a break in the clouds for a few seconds and you can see that they are still there.  i also believe this has been going on well before the first night i saw them.
content.summary: Multiple crafts in the sky every night since 11-16-08.

content.detailedDescription:
I work at the reading airport and have been in aviation for 22 years.
on the morning of event i was outside our facility to step out for a smoke with my coffee. it was still dark and about an hour before sunrise. i was staring up at the sky to the south-east and normally see air traffic climbing out of philly (60 miles away)in that sector of the sky. cloud cover was broken and covered much of the sky. i then noticed a green light about 60 degrees above horizon decending straight down to the 20 degree position when it vanished. it was at the approach end of runway 31. total elapsed time was 10-12 seconds. there was no air traffic at the airport.I could not detect any shape and only saw the bright green light glowing through the clouds. the light was circular about the size of my finger nail from arms length. the green color was like a florecent neon color. the clouds gave it a hazy aura.
i am not saying this was extraterestrial but i have 8,000 flight hours in the navy as a flight engineer and know what aircraft look like at night from a distance. perhaps a flare on a parachute but i never saw a green arial flare.
i'm curious if anyone else had reported it or if anyone has seen a green ball of light in the sky before.
content.summary: Green ball of light illuminated through cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: Talking with neighbor in front yard and just glanced up and saw round silver object moving very rapidly toward w/sw.  first impression was that this is a ufo as no wings , etc were visible. it was moving in westly direction and then veered to southwestly direction. event lasted @ 20 seconds and lost sight due to tall pine trees.  sky is clear and it moved very quickly out of sight.  neighbor did not see it.  an airliner flew by @ same altitude 30 seconds later and i would estimate at 1/5 the speed of the object.  it was exciting to see this object and wished i had had my video camera.  i am a former af officer.
content.summary: Talking with neighbor and looked up and saw rapidly speeding round silver  object.

content.detailedDescription: My name is [cms/tg/pid], i work for the navajo nation department of resource enforcement, operating title ranger.  i am a lieutenant and have been employed in law enforcement for 28 years.  i have a background as a criminal investigator.  one of the rangers reported that a navajo elderly couple and a girl saw a ufo land near their house in a rural area north-east of chinle arizona.  according to the ranger, occupants went up to the residence and used what looked like flashlights to look around the house and the outhouse before leaving.  reports of flattened grass area where craft landed.  our intent is to interview in detail the family next week at earliest oppertunity as soon as ranger makes contact and sets up time.  interest in ground effects and any impressions.  have downloaded mufon forms to facilitate our interview.  unknown exact date when event occured and how much ground evidence remains. possibly two weeks since.  call me on cell number if any additional advice if you can.
content.summary: Nightime event involving craft landing and occupants on the ground around a house.

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't see this object until i went through all my photos on my computer. i thought it was quite strange. it didn't look like a chopper or a plane or a blimp. helicopters have a skinny boom. this thing has no boom. where a boom should be it is fat and transparent. i am former army and have lived on military bases over seas for years. i know what helicopters look like. there was no sound of a chopper either.Gettysburg was as quiet as it always is.Not only that i thought gettysburg was a no fly zone or am i wrong?

the first photo is the actual photo the second photo is a photo i enlarged of the object in the first photo. i have another photo that i can show of a different object in the same location  but i couldn't enlarge it enough to really get a good look. i can send that one to you to if you like.

if you can figure out what it is please email me back and let me know.
thank you very much.

elizabeth rettig
stafford va
content.summary: Strange object and shape. some what transparent in the middle.

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern:		1/29/09


dear sir/madam;

this morning tuesday 1/29/09, i left my house at about 6:00 to go to work. it was very foggy day but not so bad on hwy 121. i was heading south toward southlake and as i got to spring creek pkwy, i notice a circle shaped object with lots of lights on top of hwy 121. (about 6:30 am )
i thought that i was seeing things but right after that another one following each other was traveling very slowly like they were observing. not too many cars on the road but very few cars that were traveling in my direction were braking to watch. it was impossible to stop so i then stopped in the nearest station and called the non-emergency police 972 941-2142. they advised me to call faa ( 206 722-3000 ), which i did and got a voice mail of mr. davenport is full. i called the police back and they told me that was the only number they had and for me to report and also fill out form on line at www.Ufocenter.Com
i saw total of 4 circle shape objects traveling slowly above hwy 121 with very bright lights perhaps 14-16 big round lights. 


thanks much
content.summary: Bright circle shape, very large.

content.detailedDescription: This image was taken at a remote monastary in china.It is not serviced by any public utilities including electricity.The object was not noticed at the time by either myself or any one present.It is in southern china near a mountain named emei shan.I was an american student attending school in shanghai and it was my habit to take pictures of interesting locations to send to my parents and family.After returning home my family was looking through the pictures and my step father noticed the object and asked if it was some sort of light fixture.After assuring him that there was not even electricy in this remote area we enlarged it to examine it more closely.It shows very interesting detail including what seems to be a puff of smoke directly above it and at higer magnification shows what seems to be atmospheric distortions above giving us the intuitive impression of downward motion.
content.summary: Didn't notice object until after browsing through pictures.

content.detailedDescription: My son(13yrs) and husband(33yrs)saw a fast moving orange star like object move across the sky last night while sitting in our hot tub star gazing. i believe from thier description it was going from northwest to south. they have seen satelights before, but my husband said this was not a satelight. i'm reporting this on their behalf. i did not see it last night, but last summer we saw a bunch of them. i have reported most of our sightings. my son always yells to me from our back door to tell me that there is another ufo that they can see. we have a very large obstructed view of the sky, so i think that's what helps us see so many.
content.summary: Saw fast moving orange star move across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Captured this dome on the moon through my 14" celestron
content.summary: Dome on the moon through my 14" celestron.

content.detailedDescription: For the past 3+ months i have witnessing very bright starlike/teardrop objects over house, car and work. i know that someone from hockessin, de has witnessed the same phenonemon and has reported it on here. also, witnessed 6 weeks ago an object no more than 500-1,000 over the restaurant we were coming out of only 5 miles from my house a type of object that resembled right out of the movies the "bat plane" which had a very very high pitched sound and moved with the greatest speed i have ever witnessed.  also have seen an oblong silver structure very low to the ground trailing in white steam very early in the am leaving long steam trails.  i am writing to report what i witnessed last night and have been witnessing for a very long time.  last night i was leaving work and this teardrop object was about 1,000 ft. above my complex.  it moved very slowly along with a very large dark round object from right to left as i walked about 100 yards to my car.  i then drove to the grocery store about 2 miles away and noticed it was still over me but was much lower.  when i came out of the store it was still there only moved a little more to the right.  i drove home about 5 miles and noticed it followed me to my house.  at this point, it was as if you could reach out and touch it perhaps 1,000 ft. above as i could see the inside was lit up and it had a blue hue around the back of it.  throughout the night i would go to my windows and i noticed there were about 4 of these objects not too high up and were constantly changing positions.  also, there were yellow starlike objects that i see every night hovering over the treeline and staying for hours.  one night last week the sky was loaded with so many of these objects that i was amazed.  but they disappeared after 2 hrs.  also, my dog has been very nervous and is very hesitant to go out for walks when he always would be the first one at the door.  i really would like to discuss this with someone as the objects are growing and i'm seeing more and more.  my family has seen these but i guess the element of unknown scares them and they make excuses.  i know what i'm seeing is true and real.  i do have pics on request.
content.summary: Witnessed starlike/teardrop object over house and car.

content.detailedDescription:
went out for a cigarette during my lunch break at work, walmart@ 136 st. in westminster, accompanied by 2 coworkers.

    as we made our way into the parking lot i saw a bright green light, which was lit the whole time it was in sight, headed at a 90 degree angle for the ground.
    the entire incident only took about 10 seconds and i instantly looked back and forth at my coworkers, one of which was doing the same exact thing i was. he and i made eye contact and he told me "yea, i saw that thing too."

    the craft was definitely round looking, but it moved so fast and was out of sight that i would have a hard time giving any other specifics.

    it did not look like anything i've ever seen before and i have already checked the local news to see if anything had crashed, which nothing was reported. the constant green color of the craft, which encompassed the entire body of the craft, like the thing was emitting this light itself was very bright and never blinked. 

    flash of green light, headed to earth at a 90 degree angle, 10 seconds and gone. 2 eyewitnesses. thats it.
content.summary: Bright green light, headed in a 90 degree angle straight for the ground...Fast.

content.detailedDescription: One morning in late december, 2007, before dawn, at 7:10am, as i was driving to work, i noticed a line of very bright white lights in the sky above the fields northwest of fredericktown, ohio.  it was a very dark, foggy morning, and driving was difficult both because of the fog and other drivers headlights following closely behind me.  i was on ohio state route 13, headed north, at about the point where the highway narrows from four lanes into two and curves, first to the right and then back to the left, juse north of fredericktown, when i first saw this horizontal line of six or eight white lights (i dont remember exactly how many).  they were very bright, equally spaced apart, and seemingly stationary.  it was impossible to tell whether they were very close to me and low to the ground, or very far away and high above the ground, but from my vantage point they appeared to be about 300 feet above the ground and maybe a half-mile or so distant.  they did not move, or change position in relationship to the ground or to each other as i followed the road around the two curves.  i lost sight of them as i traveled further north on the highway.  i do not know if i lost sight of them because of the fog, or because i had traveled past them, and they were now behind me, or because they were no longer there.  because of the traffic behind me, i could not drive much slower than i already was, or pull over to watch them.  as i said, it was very foggy, a low, patchy ground fog, and these lights appeared to be well above the fog.  the only rational explanation i can offer is that it was the landing lights of a formation of two c-130 aircraft from the air national guard (or perhaps a single aircraft, given the configuration of the landing lights on the wings of that aircraft) going to land at lahm field in mansfield.  as a pilot, i have seen the landing lights of large aircraft when they are at a great distance and headed directly towards me, and they appear to be stationary for a time, but eventually they will disappear because the aircraft turns or goes behind a cloud layer.  these lights  if they were aircraft landing lights  appeared very much brighter and larger than i had before seen on distant aircraft, indicating that they were very close.  but, if they were close, i should have been able to see the red and green navigation lights on the wingtips, and the flashing red beacons or strobes on the fuselages, as well as movement.  i thought at first that it might be a blimp  the goodyear blimp is stationed nearby in akron, and i see it fly by several times a year, on its way to cover a football game somewhere  but i cannot think why one would be flying cross country at night, or in this weather and at this time of the year in this area.  furthermore, i have never seen this arrangement of lights on a blimp, and a blimp would also have red and green navigation lights.  besides that, both c-130s and blimps are noisy aircraft.  the thought occurred to me that it might be going to attempt  a crash landing on the highway, so i put down the window so i could see more clearly and so i could hear whatever it was, but there was no sound besides that made by my own tires on the road.
content.summary: Line of 6 or 8 very bright white lights in sky, motionless.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just got back from work and was watering the plants in the garden just before dusk. the sky was clear and it was warm. as i was watering i became aware of a strange silence. there was no bird song or any other sounds i would hear on a usual evening. the silence was strange because it was not silence exactly, and the only way i can describe it is that it was anti-sound.
so i looked up from the plants and saw a large triangular object sort of sliding in a curve about 200 feet above the house. 
it it must have been 30 to 50 meters across. it was gun metal grey and had 4 lights on the underside. a large orange one in the center and 3 white ones on the corners. the corners were rounded 
when i realised it was not a low flying conventional aircraft i dropped the hose and ran inside to get my mobile phone to photograph it. 
i was gone for literally 10 seconds but when i returned it was no longer above the house. it had travelled to what looked like about a mile away towards the horizon and was disappearing fast. then, when it was just a small dot in the distance it shot off at an 11 o'clock angle into the sky at impossible speed and was gone. 
unfortunately i didn't manage to take a photo, and people don't believe me. but i know what i saw. (it looked very similar to the attached picture).
content.summary: Silent triangle over country house.

content.detailedDescription: Flying saucer, low humming, parting fog and rain
content.summary: Stood the hairs on my arms up.
